trans-unit.resname: SS3·1 | Chandra, Torch of Defiance | Card Text
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Exile the top card of your library. You may cast that card. If you don't, Chandra, Torch of Defiance deals 2 damage to each opponent. [+1]: Add {R}{R}. [−3]: Chandra, Torch of Defiance deals 4 damage to target creature. [−7]: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, this emblem deals 5 damage to any target."
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard two cards. Draw three cards.
The chasm of years and worlds collapsed under the power of their embrace.
Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Fiery Confluence deals 1 damage to each creature. • Fiery Confluence deals 2 damage to each opponent. • Destroy target artifact.

trans-unit.resname: SS3·4 | Past in Flames | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
Choose one — • Counter target spell if it's blue. • Destroy target permanent if it's blue.

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that has the same name as a card in your graveyard, you may put a quest counter on Pyromancer Ascension. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell while Pyromancer Ascension has two or more quest counters on it, you may copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

trans-unit.resname: SS3·7 | Rite of Flame | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Add {R}{R}, then add {R} for each card named Rite of Flame in each graveyard.

trans-unit.source: As the flames engulfed her, Chandra opened her heart and offered up her greatest regrets to be consumed by the inferno.
